Package camzup.kotlin

Class KtMat4

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Mat4
camzup.kotlin.KtMat4
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<KtVec4>
public class KtMat4 extends Mat4 implements Iterable<KtVec4>
Provides Kotlin operator overloading support for four dimensional matrices.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final class 
    KtMat4.M4Iterator
    An iterator, which allows a matrix's components to be accessed in an enhanced for loop.

    • contains

      public boolean contains(float v)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the evaluation

    • div

      public KtMat4 div(float b)
      Returns a new matrix with the division of the instance by the right operand. For interoperability with Kotlin: a / b . Does not mutate the matrix in place.
      Parameters:
      b - the right operand
      Returns:
      the quotient
      See Also:
      • times(float)

    • divAssign

      public void divAssign(float b)
      Divides the instance by the right operand (mutates the matrix in place). For interoperability with Kotlin: a /= b .
      Parameters:
      b - the right operand
      See Also:
      • timesAssign(float)
      • Mat4.identity(Mat4)

      Returns:
